divs: sighting detailson sept. 15th at approximately 11pm i pulled into my driveway. i noticed a golden yellow ovalish circle in the sky. something looked off to me. half of the circle was dark-- like a line was divided right down the middle. it looked too low and a little oval to me, but i decided it was the moon. i went into the house and a few minutes later i noticed the "moon" was in a different place. i ran to get my mother. when i went outside to look at it it had turned into an orange flash and was moving very fast. by the time my mother came outside she could only see an orange light \ flash thru the trees. then the object disappeared. this object was initially in about the same place (except) much closer to me as the ufo i reported to mufon in feb. of 2009.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Caseyville
There were no other sightings in Caseyville on or around September 15th 2010
Summary: Golden - yellow moon - like ball turns into an orange flash in Caseyville, IL
